window.osascript: tell application "Finder" to make new Finder window

window.description: Open the Terminal application and run a command. Space 4 will close this terminal.
window.osascript: tell application "Terminal" to do script "echo -n -e '\\033]0;mac-space Removable Terminal\\007';"
tell application "Finder" to make new Finder window

window.description: Open the Terminal application and run a command.
Close the previously opened terminal window.
window.osascript: tell application "Terminal" to do script "echo -n -e '\\033]0;mac-space Removable Terminal\\007';"
window.osascriptPre: tell application "Terminal" to close (every window whose name contains "mac-space Removable Terminal")
